game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Character
      • game.Player

  • public class Player
extends Character
    The class Player extends Characters and represents the hero of the game

    A player is characterized by the following informations:

    • A maximum health which is not alterable
    • A name
    • An inventory that contains all the items that the player has
    • A current place
    • A weapon

    Version:
    1.0
